questions_and_answers.question: What is the focus of the Bachelor of Technology in Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: The main focus of the program is on Computer Networks (Wired and Wireless) and Telecommunications technologies. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What are the areas covered in the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program covers areas such as Computer Science, Cloud Computing, Multimedia Communications, and Big Data Analytics. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the objective of the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program aims to develop practical skills and in-depth knowledge required by the present industrial scenario. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What kind of research can students engage in through the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: Students can engage in research focusing on the fusion of multi-disciplinary skills employed in designing modern computing devices with communication channels, communication systems with advanced computer algorithms and systems. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What are the basic courses offered in the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program provides experiential learning on basic courses in computer science, communication networks, security, and associated subjects. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What are the advanced courses offered in the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program offers advanced courses in computer science, communication networks, security, and associated subjects. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the duration of the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program is a Bachelor of Technology degree, which typically takes four years to complete. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What skills can students expect to develop through the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: Students can expect to develop practical skills, problem-solving strategies, simulation skills, and mathematical foundations. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: How does the Computer & Communication Engineering program prepare students for real-world problems?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program provides hands-on training required to solve real-world problems. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the significance of the Computer & Communication Engineering program in the present industrial scenario?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program equips students with the expertise required by the present industrial scenario in Computer Communication Technologies and Telecommunications. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the role of computer networks in the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: Computer networks (Wired and Wireless) are a significant area of focus in the Computer & Communication Engineering program. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: How does the Computer & Communication Engineering program integrate communication techniques and problem-solving strategies?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program integrates communication techniques, problem-solving strategies, simulation skills, and mathematical foundations to provide a comprehensive education in Computer & Communication Engineering. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the importance of simulation skills in the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: Simulation skills are essential in the Computer & Communication Engineering program as they enable students to design and test systems before implementing them in real-world applications. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: How does the Computer & Communication Engineering program equip students for research?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program equips students with the necessary skills and knowledge to engage in research in the field of Computer & Communication Engineering. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the role of Cloud Computing in the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: Cloud Computing is an essential area of study in the Computer & Communication Engineering program, which focuses on the design and implementation of distributed computing systems. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the significance of Big Data Analytics in the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: Big Data Analytics is a critical area of study in the Computer & Communication Engineering program, which focuses on the analysis and processing of large data sets. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: How does the Computer & Communication Engineering program help students develop practical skills?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program provides hands-on training and experiential learning opportunities to help students develop practical skills in Computer & Communication Engineering. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the role of mathematical foundations in the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mathematical foundations are essential in the Computer & Communication Engineering program as they provide the necessary tools and techniques for analyzing and designing complex systems. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: How does the Computer & Communication Engineering program integrate communication systems with advanced computer algorithms and systems?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program integrates communication systems with advanced computer algorithms and systems to provide a comprehensive education in Computer & Communication Engineering. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the significance of multimedia communications in the Computer & Communication Engineering program?
questions_and_answers.answer: Multimedia communications are essential in the Computer & Communication Engineering program as they focus on the design and implementation of multimedia systems, which are increasingly becoming important in modern communication systems. For further details visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-CCN.php

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. CHIDANANDA T's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. CHIDANANDA T has a BE in Information Science and Engineering from GM Institute of Technology, Davanagere in 2011, and an MTech in Computer Networks and Engineering from Siddaganga Institute of Technology, Tumakuru in 2013.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Mr. CHIDANANDA T's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. CHIDANANDA T worked as an Assistant Professor at Acharya Institute of Technology, Bengaluru from Nov 2020 to Sept 2021, as a Technical Trainer at Amphisoft Technologies Pvt Limited, Bengaluru from Aug 2019 to Dec 2019, as an Assistant Lecturer at National Institute of Technology Karnataka, Surathkal from Jul 2018 to May 2019, as a Junior Research Fellow at National Institute of Technology Goa, Ponda from Feb 2017 to Aug 2017, and as an Assistant Professor at Siddaganga Institute of Technology, Tumakuru from Aug 2014 to Feb 2017.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. CHIDANANDA T's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. CHIDANANDA T's areas of interest include Information Security and Routing issues in Wireless Sensor Networks.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. CHIDANANDA T's achievements?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. CHIDANANDA T has received several achievements including TEQIP Fund, District Level Rank, KSET clearance, VTU-ETR clearance, qualification for the 2nd round of Scientist B exam, and UGC-NET qualification.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. CHIDANANDA T's professional memberships?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. CHIDANANDA T is an associate member of The Institution of Engineers(India).

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Mr. CHIDANANDA T handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. CHIDANANDA T has handled subjects such as Object-Oriented Concepts using C++ and Java, Fundamentals of C Programming Language, Cryptography and Network Security, Unix Shell Programming, Software Engineering, Web Design Techniques, Digital Systems and Computer Organisation, and Design and Analysis of Algorithms.

questions_and_answers.question: In which conferences/CME/workshops has Mr. CHIDANANDA T participated?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. CHIDANANDA T has participated in various workshops and programs including those related to Big Data Ecosystem, IoT, programming interviews, NS-2 and LATEX, IT awareness/training program, and FDPs on themes like universal human values in technical education and cyber-physical systems.

questions_and_answers.question: What conference/journal publications does Mr. CHIDANANDA T have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. CHIDANANDA T has an analyzed paper titled 'Vulnerability Examination on the Rekeying Schemes in Wireless Sensor Networks' and a published paper titled 'A Survey on the Energy-Efficient Hierarchical Routing Techniques in Wireless Sensor Networks'.

questions_and_answers.question: What additional information is available about Mr. CHIDANANDA T?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. CHIDANANDA T has certifications in Problem Solving through Programming in C, Programming in Java, completion of 'The Complete Java Certification Course', and is currently pursuing a course on Practical Data Structures & Algorithms in Java. Additionally, Mr. CHIDANANDA T has completed a course on Java & J2EE.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. MAMATHA K M's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. MAMATHA K M is currently pursuing a Ph.D. at JNNCE Research Centre, Shimoga, affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU)Belgaum. She has an M.E from Atria Institute of Technology, Bangalore, and a B.E from GM Institute of Technology, Davangere, both affiliated to Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU)Belgaum.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. MAMATHA K M's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. MAMATHA K M's areas of interest include Wireless Sensor Networks, Swarm Intelligence and bio-Inspired computing, and Natural Language Processing.

questions_and_answers.question: What conference/journal publications does Ms. MAMATHA K M have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. MAMATHA K M has publications including 'Firefly Algorithm for Self Organization of Mobile Wireless Sensor Network' in the Journal of Communications and 'A Firefly Optimization Algorithm for Maximizing the Connectivity in Mobile Wireless Sensor Network' in the Handbook of Wireless Sensor Networks: Issues and Challenges in Current Scenarios.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. SANDEEP KUMAR S's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. SANDEEP KUMAR S has a B.E in Computer Science and Engineering from SSEC (VTU) in 2011, and an M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from Canara Engineering College (VTU) in 2013. He is currently pursuing a Ph.D.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Mr. SANDEEP KUMAR S's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. SANDEEP KUMAR S worked as a Senior Assistant Professor at M.I.T.E Moodabidri from 15/07/2013 to 30/8/2022.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. SANDEEP KUMAR S's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. SANDEEP KUMAR S's areas of interest include Image Processing and Machine Learning.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Mr. SANDEEP KUMAR S have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. SANDEEP KUMAR S is a member of the Indian Society for Technical Education.

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Mr. SANDEEP KUMAR S handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. SANDEEP KUMAR S has handled subjects such as Discrete Mathematical Structure, Operation Research, Object Oriented Modelling and Design, Software Testing, Software Engineering, Unix and Shell programming, Computer Networks, Data Communication, Natural Language Processing, Operating System, User Interface Development, Web Technology and its Application, Introduction to Data Structure, and Python.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. KRISHNA PRASAD D S's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. KRISHNA PRASAD D S is pursuing a Ph.D. He has a Master of Technology (M.Tech) in Computer Science and Engineering from VTU, Belgaum, and a Bachelor of Engineering (B.E) in Information Science and Engineering from VTU, Belgaum.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Mr. KRISHNA PRASAD D S's past experience?

He also worked as an Assistant Professor in the Department of CS&E at Canara Engineering College, Bantwal, from July 2014 to July 2022.

questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. KRISHNA PRASAD D S's areas of interest include Computer Networks, Network Security, Cyber Security, and Blockchain Technology.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Mr. KRISHNA PRASAD D S have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. KRISHNA PRASAD D S has a lifetime membership with the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE).

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Mr. KRISHNA PRASAD D S handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. KRISHNA PRASAD D S has handled subjects such as Data Communication, Computer Networks, Mobile Application Development, .Net Framework for Application Development, C Programming for Problem Solving, and Computer Organization.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. MANJUNATHA A S's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. MANJUNATHA A S is pursuing a Ph.D. He has an M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering from NMAMIT, Nitte in 2012, a B.E. in Information Science and Engineering from VCET, Puttur in 2006, and a Diploma in Computer Science and Engineering from VPT, Puttur in 2003.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Mr. MANJUNATHA A S's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. MANJUNATHA A S worked as an Assistant Professor Gd.II at NMAMIT, Nitte in August 2021, as an Assistant Professor (Sr) at SMVITM, Bantakal from October 2020 to August 2021, as a Senior Assistant Professor at MITE, Moodabidri from July 2009 to September 2020, and as a Software Engineer at Trianz Consulting Pvt Ltd, Bengaluru, from October 2006 to July 2009.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. MANJUNATHA A S's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. MANJUNATHA A S's areas of interest include Database Systems, Network Security, and Wireless Sensor Networks.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Mr. MANJUNATHA A S have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. MANJUNATHA A S has a life membership with the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE).

Ltd., Bangalore from July 2005 to March 2007, and as a Trainer at Aptech Computer Education in Belagavi from August 2003 to May 2005.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. RADHAKRISHNA's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. RADHAKRISHNA holds a BE from NMAM Institute Of Technology in 2003, an M. Tech. from NMAM Institute of Technology, Nitte in 2007, and a Ph.D.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Dr. RADHAKRISHNA's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. RADHAKRISHNA has 6 months of teaching experience as a Lecturer at SGS College, Bhatkal, and 18 years of teaching experience in NMAMIT, Nitte.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. RADHAKRISHNA's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. RADHAKRISHNA's areas of interest include Cryptography and Network Security, Cyber Security and Forensics, Machine Learning, and Database Management Systems.

questions_and_answers.question: What achievement does Dr. RADHAKRISHNA have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. RADHAKRISHNA received the Best Paper award for the paper entitled 'A New Approach on Advanced Encryption Standards to Improve the Secrecy and Speed Using Nonlinear Output Feedback Mode' at the AIDE-19 conference held at NMAMIT Nitte.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. RADHAKRISHNA's departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. RADHAKRISHNA serves as the NAAC and NBA Criterion Coordinator, Class Advisor, BOS and BOE Member, and Department Association ACE Coordinator.

questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. RADHAKRISHNA is a member of the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE) and the International Association of Engineers (IAENG).

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Dr. RADHAKRISHNA handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. RADHAKRISHNA has handled subjects such as Cryptography and Network, Cyber Security and Forensics, Data Communications, Computer Networks, Formal Languages and Automata Theory, Database Management Systems, Computer Organization and Architecture, Multicore Architecture and Programming, Programming Languages (C, C++), etc.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. ASHISH SINGH's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHISH SINGH holds a Ph.D. from the Department of Electronics and Communication at JK Institute of Applied Physics & Technology, University of Allahabad, Allahabad in 2015. He also has an M.Tech in Communication Technology from the same institute in 2009, and a B.Tech in Applied Electronics and Instrumentation Engineering from Uttar Pradesh Technical University, Lucknow in 2007.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Dr. ASHISH SINGH's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHISH SINGH has worked as an Assistant Professor Gd-III in the Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering at NMAMIT, Nitte from April 2017. Prior to that, he was an Assistant Professor at Raghu Engineering College, Dakamarri from August 2015 to March 2017, and a Lecturer at Dr. Rizivi College of Engineering, Kaushambhi from July 2009 to June 2010.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. ASHISH SINGH's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHISH SINGH's areas of interest include Analog Communication, Optical communication, Radar System, Bio-medical Instrumentation, Transmission Lines, Microwave Devices and Communication, Antenna and Wave Propagation, Nanotechnology, RF and circuit Device, Sensors and Actuators.

questions_and_answers.question: What achievements does Dr. ASHISH SINGH have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHISH SINGH has achieved GATE Qualified in 2007 (Instrumentation Engineering), M.Tech scholarship under MHRD (2007-2009), Ph.D Scholarship under UGC (2010-2014), and received the Best Paper award for the paper entitled 'Inset Fed Semi-circular Disk Patch Antenna for Dual and Broadband Operation' at the 2nd International Conference on Electrical Computer and Communication technology held at SVS College of Engineering, Coimbatore on 22-24 Feb. 2017.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. ASHISH SINGH's departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHISH SINGH serves as a Proctor.

questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHISH SINGH has handled subjects such as Analog Communication, Optical communication, Radar System, Bio-medical Instrumentation, Transmission Lines, Microwave Devices and Communication, Antenna and Wave Propagation, Nanotechnology, RF and circuit Device, Sensors and Actuators.

questions_and_answers.question: What conferences/CME/workshops has Dr. ASHISH SINGH attended?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHISH SINGH has attended various workshops and seminars including Analog IC Design and System Using Cadence and P-Spice, Therapeutic counseling for teachers in higher education, Advances in Wireless and Optical Networks, ICT: Current perspective, 3G Wireless Networks, MIMO Systems and Antenna Design, Scientific/ Research Paper Writing, Trends in Computer Vision, and 5th Science conclave/ INSPIRE Internship Program.

questions_and_answers.question: How many B.E projects has Dr. ASHISH SINGH guided?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. ASHISH SINGH has guided 24 B.E projects and is currently guiding 4.
